pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Bio Retinol Renewing Night Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Bio-Retinol Renewing Night Cream is a true multi-tasker to put the bounce back into your skin. Age-defying botanical actives combine with skin-improving Polypeptides and antioxidant-rich Bakuchiol - a natural alternative to retinol, to improve hydration and skin texture. Wake up to refreshed, renewed and healthy-looking skin that is more plump, soft and smooth.

Bakuchiol - natural alternative to retinol:
Nature's saving grace, this plant-based alternative to Vitamin A delivers similar benefits to retinol the same benefits as retinol without the harsh effects. Its antioxidant properties help protect the skin from free radical damage caused by environmental triggers that may cause premature aging.

Skin-improving polypeptides: Visibly improves the skin's appearance overnight. Your skin will feel healthier and more renewed.


Age-defying botanical complex - clinically proven to be ultra-hydrating: Plumps, softens and smooths dry skin for lasting hydration.

Size: 50g

Warnings

This product contains essential oils. Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Moringa Oleifera (Moringa) Seed Oil, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polyacrylate Starch, Glyceryl Monostearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Saccharide Isomerate, Fragrance, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lecithin, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein (Botanical Polypeptide), Bakuchiol (Natural alternative to Retinol), Disodium Edetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Citronellol, Biphenyl Azepanyl Methanone, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Farnesol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Linalool, Limonene.

Directions

DIRECTIONS: After cleansing and serum application, apply at night to face, neck and decolletage. For ultimate hydration, follow with the Swisse Polypeptide Renewing Sleep Mask.

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

DIRECTIONS: After cleansing and serum application, apply at night to face, neck and decolletage. For ultimate hydration, follow with the Swisse Polypeptide Renewing Sleep Mask.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
